pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reduced Piecewise Exponential Estimate/Test Software // This reduced piecewise exponential survival software implements the likelihood ratio test and backward elimination procedure in Han, Schell, and Kim (2012 doi:10.1080/19466315.2012.698945, 2014 doi:10.1002/sim.5915), and Han et al. (2016 doi:10.1111/biom.12590). Inputs to the program can be either times when events/censoring occur or the vectors of total time on test and the number of events. Outputs of the programs are times and the corresponding p-values in the backward elimination. Details about the model and implementation are given in Han et al. 2014. This program can run in R version 3.2.2 and above.
